extDesc.message: Extension which lets you read your Facebook news feed and wall. You can also post status updates.

statusFiller.description: Text inviting a user to post a status.

unlike.description: Verb to remove your liking of a post.

error.message: Sorry, your login did not work, please try again.
error.description: Error message displayed when login did not work

statusWidth.description: How big a textarea can we fit?

logout.description: Text that goes in button to logout

likesThis.description: Text that appears next to the name of whomever likes a post

likeThis.description: Text that appears next to the name of whoever likes a post

someone.description: Text that appears before indication someone likes a post

commentFiller.description: Message imploring user to leave comment

intro.message: The updated Facebook for Google Chrome now uses Facebook Connect. To get started, click below:
